Class FedmIscPeopleCounter

  de.feig.FedmIscPeopleCounter

public class FedmIscPeopleCounter
extends java.lang.Object

Class for the OBID i-scan® People Counter ID ISC.ANT1690/600-GPC or ID ISC.ANT1700/740-GPC.

Method Detail

getCounterValues

public long[] getCounterValues()
                        throws FePortDriverException,
                               FeReaderDriverException,
                               FedmException
method to request the counter values

Returns:
array with four counter values

Description:
Protocol traffic is executed with this method. The result is returned by an array:.

Index

Note

0

Counter 1 of Radar Detector 1

1

Counter 2 of Radar Detector 1

2

Counter 1 of Radar Detector 2

3

Counter 2 of Radar Detector 2
This communication method can be used with all port drivers.

Throws:
FedmException
FeReaderDriverException
FePortDriverException

setCounterValues

public int setCounterValues(long radar1Counter1,
                            long radar1Counter2,
                            long radar2Counter1,
                            long radar2Counter2)
                     throws FePortDriverException,
                            FeReaderDriverException,
                            FedmException
method to set the counter values

Parameters:
radar1Counter1 - Counter 1 of Radar Detector 1
radar1Counter2 - Counter 2 of Radar Detector 1
radar2Counter1 - Counter 1 of Radar Detector 2
radar2Counter2 - Counter 2 of Radar Detector 2
This communication method can be used with all port drivers.

Returns:
status OK (=0) or status byte (>0) or error code (<0)

Description:
Protocol traffic is executed with this method.
Throws:
FedmException
FeReaderDriverException
FePortDriverException

setOutputsOn

public int setOutputsOn(int holdTime1,
                        int holdTime2,
                        int holdTime3)
                 throws FePortDriverException,
                        FeReaderDriverException,
                        FedmException
method to set up to three outputs ON

Parameters:
holdTime1 - settling time for output 1
holdTime2 - settling time for output 2
holdTime3 - settling time for output 3
If the settling time is zero, the output is not set.
If the settling time is 65535, the output is set permanently.
This communication method can be used with all port drivers.

Returns:
status OK (=0) or status byte (>0) or error code (<0)

Description:
Protocol traffic is executed with this method.
The settling time is in steps of 100ms, e.g. 10: 10x100ms = 1s.
The range for each time is 0...65535.
Throws:
FedmException
FeReaderDriverException
FePortDriverException

setOutputsFlashing

public int setOutputsFlashing(int frequencyOut1,
                              int holdTime1,
                              int frequencyOut2,
                              int holdTime2,
                              int frequencyOut3,
                              int holdTime3)
                       throws FePortDriverException,
                              FeReaderDriverException,
                              FedmException
method to set up to three outputs FLASHING ON

Parameters:
frequencyOut1 - flash frequency of output 1 (1, 2, 4, 8 [Hz])
holdTime1 - settling time for output 1
frequencyOut2 - flash frequency of output 2 (1, 2, 4, 8 [Hz])
holdTime2 - settling time for output 2
frequencyOut3 - flash frequency of output 3 (1, 2, 4, 8 [Hz])
holdTime3 - settling time for output 3
If the settling time is zero, the output is not set.
If the settling time is 65535, the output is set permanently.
This communication method can be used with all port drivers.

Returns:
status OK (=0) or status byte (>0) or error code (<0)

Description:
Protocol traffic is executed with this method.
The settling time is in steps of 100ms, e.g. 10: 10x100ms = 1s.
The range for each time is 0...65535.
Throws:
FedmException
FeReaderDriverException
FePortDriverException
